page.title: 20THE NEXT DOMESDAY
page.content: Throughout this project we (the pupils) have been talking about how interesting it would have been to be able to look through 'Domesday's'of the past inorder to compare them with our lives, employment, entertainment, etc today. We all hope that the project will be repeated at regular intervals in the future for this very purpose. The young people of Feltham are very fortunate in that there are plenty of opportunities available of both a social and economic nature. With there being so much employment many young people have a lot of money to spend on clothes,cars, motor-bikes, music, etc. Finally Mr.Phillips would like to thank Arvinder, Colin, Sarah, Kevin, Leigh, Selina, Sally, Paul, Roger, Debs, Celia, Richard, Rachel and Nik for their help.
